articles.title: DeepSeek Panic Live Updates: Trump Calls AI Development ‘Positive’ Despite Tech Stock Plunge - Forbes
articles.description: The president spoke Monday afternoon about the new AI model that roiled the U.S. tech industry.
articles.content: The release of a less capital-intensive artificial intelligence model from Chinas DeepSeek sent a chill through the U.S. stock market Monday, initiating a massive selloff led by Nvidia and hitting bi… [+9682 chars]

articles.author: Julie Bort
articles.title: Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger is already using DeepSeek instead of OpenAI at his startup, Gloo - TechCrunch
articles.description: The tech industry's reaction to AI model DeepSeek R1 has been wild. Pat Gelsinger, for instance, is elated and thinks it will make AI better for everyone.
articles.content:
DeepSeeks new open source AI reasoning model, R1, sparked a sell-off of Nvidias stock and caused its consumer app to soar to the top of the app stores.

articles.content:
Apple released new software updates on Monday, including iOS 18.3, which automatically opts users into Apple Intelligence, at least for newer devices.
